item.title: Announcing EPUBTools and its website
item.description: EPUBTools is an application which helps you build EPUB eBooks. It has been under development for several years, with many changes coming from experience in using this tool to format several books. It is now easy to use, and competently produces EPUB's that pass the checks in EPUBCheck.

item.title: EPUBTools 0.8.0 released
item.description: EPUBTools version 0.8 has been released, in conjunction with release of AkashaRender 0.8. All prior versions of EPUBTools have been deprecated, and are no longer supported.

item.title: EPUBTools 0.8.3 -- Adopting latest xmldom, TypeScript types
item.description: EPUBTools version 0.8.3 has been released, eliminating a security warning for the xmldom dependency. This release also includes TypeScript type definitions files.
